amendment.description: An amendment numbered 13 printed in House Report 114-742 to require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs or a designee to review covered whistleblower complaints quarterly.
amendment.purpose: Amendment requires the Secretary of Veterans Affairs or a designee to review covered whistleblower complaints quarterly.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lowenthal amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Lowenthal.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lowenthal amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
